title: MADE FROM SCRATCH SKILLET CORNBREAD
directions: Preheat oven to 400 degrees F. In a medium bowl, combine flour, cornmeal, sugar, baking powder, baking soda, and salt into a bowl. Stir in the buttermilk, 1/3 cup melted butter and eggs until mixture is moistened. Melt 1 tablespoon butter in cast iron skillet. Pour batter immediately into pan. Place in oven and bake for 15-20 minutes or until toothpick inserted in center comes out clean. Remove and serve warm.
